outerHTML:
Shinobi NVR LXC

Shinobi is an open-source, self-hosted network video recording (NVR) software. It allows you to manage and monitor security cameras and record video footage. Shinobi can be run on various platforms including Linux, macOS, and Raspberry Pi, and offers features such as real-time streaming, motion detection, and email notifications.

To create a new Proxmox VE Shinobi NVR LXC, run the command below in the Proxmox VE Shell.
To Update Shinobi, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/shinobi.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 8GB Storage - 2vCPU - Privileged ⚡

Shinobi Interface: IP:8080

Shinobi Admin Interface: IP:8080/super

⚙️ Initial Admin Login

username admin@shinobi.video

password admin
